mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, GROUPID, CREATETIME, CREATEOPER, STATUS, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, RECORDENUM, SUCCESSNUM, ERRORNUM, SENDTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RETURNID, TITLE, RESERVE3, RESERVE4 from db_sendmessage where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, GROUPID, CREATETIME, CREATEOPER, STATUS, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, RECORDENUM, SUCCESSNUM, ERRORNUM, SENDTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RETURNID, TITLE, RESERVE3, RESERVE4 from db_sendmessage
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , GROUPID , CREATETIME , CREATEOPER , STATUS , CHECKOPER , CHECKTIME , RECORDENUM , SUCCESSNUM , ERRORNUM , SENDTIME , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE5 , RESERVE6 , RESERVE7 , RESERVE8 , RETURNID , TITLE , RESERVE3 , RESERVE4

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CREATEOPER = #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CHECKOPER = #{checkoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
RECORDENUM = #{recordenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SUCCESSNUM = #{successnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ERRORNUM = #{errornum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SENDTIME = #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE6 = #{reserve6,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE7 = #{reserve7,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE8 = #{reserve8,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RETURNID = #{returnid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
